course_description: This course focuses on primary care settings with well children and their parents/families. Emphasis is on advanced health assessment, communication with infants/children and families; health promotion, maintenance; and acute problems in pediatric primary and acute care. Didactic and clinical component.
sections: Class Nbr: 3227, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 1-2:50p, Instructor: Close/Reyes, Status: Open
